manual/index.html.title: Scene System Overview | Scene System
manual/index.html.keywords: Scene System Overview Scene System is a library that provides functions related to scene management in Unity. This library includes an API for loading scenes and a function that enables scene settings on the editor. Overview Scene System is a library that provides functions related to scene management in Unity. This library includes an API for loading scenes and a function that enables scene settings on the editor. Features API for multi-functional scene management that extends SceneManager Add SceneReference that can set scene reference on Inspector LoadingScreen component for easy implementation of loading screens SceneContainer for efficient multi-scene management Supports coroutines and async/await Support UniRx/UniTask

manual/Installation.html.title: 설치하기 | Scene System
manual/Installation.html.keywords: 설치하기 Git UPM Installing the Scene System package requires the following steps: Make sure Git is installed. Open Package Manager. Click the + button and click the Add package from git URL. Enter https://github.com/NK-Studio/SceneSystem.git#UPM and click the Add button. UnityPackage Download and install the latest version of the package from GitHub Releases.
